summary: This module implements a MoNet graph neural network using DGL and MXNet to perform node classification on standard citation graph datasets (Cora, Citeseer, Pubmed). It includes data loading, model definition with GMMConv layers, and utilities for training and evaluating the model.
business_intent: Provide an example and reference implementation for applying the MoNet architecture to citation network benchmarks, facilitating research, education, and rapid prototyping of graph deep learning solutions.
